items.title: Welcome to Redux
items.content_html:
Redux is an absurdly bare-bones Jekyll theme. Use it as is or as a launchpad for your own creations.

This theme was created to see how much I could justify stripping away while also leveraging browsersâ€™ default styles. It was fun to do.
items.summary: Redux is an absurdly bare-bones Jekyll theme. Use it as is or as a launchpad for your own creations.
